message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your share is losing value faster than mine. Let's be realistic and split a bit more evenly this time.
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half, considering my loss to inflation
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the inflation working against you.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, don't let inflation win
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
